title.rendered: The Data Service Studio is now “Data Services”

content.rendered: The Data Service Studio is rebranding itself to more accurately reflect the broad portfolio of services we offer in support of all stages of the data and research lifecycle. Effective immediately the service will be called “NYU Data Services.”  The Data Services lab will now refer to the facility, including the workstations with specialty software, and is only one of the many services offered.
